name: Cinnamoth

ability.name: Mysterious Scales
ability.description: When activated, attacks target enemy with Poison Fog.

description:
Sniffing its scales produces a feeling of unparalleled euphoria.
There was some effort to further regulate this byproduct, but the Free Pal Alliance have vehemently opposed these measures, putting a stop to them.

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Wind Cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Poison Fog
skills.description: Generates a fog of poison in front, causing the opponent to become poisoned.

skills.name: Sand Tornado
skills.description: Generates two sand tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Seed Mine
skills.description: Launches a deadly seed. If it hits an enemy, the seed explodes.

skills.name: Grass Tornado
skills.description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Solar Blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
